mapper.select: SELECT /* PurchaseSacCommonMapper.searchCommonCodeList, 공통 코드 조회, 이승택/nTels, 2014-12-03 */ cd_id , cd_nm , add_field_01 , add_field_02 , cd_desc , indc_rank FROM tb_cm_cd WHERE cd_id IN #{cdId} AND lang_cd = #{langCd} AND use_yn = 'Y'

SELECT /* PurchaseSacCommonMapper.searchCommonCodeListByGrpCdId, 공통 코드 조회, 이승택/nTels, 2014-12-03 */ cd_id , cd_nm , add_field_01 , add_field_02 , cd_desc , indc_rank FROM tb_cm_cd WHERE grp_cd_id = #{grpCdId} AND lang_cd = #{langCd} AND use_yn = 'Y'

SELECT /* PurchaseSacCommonMapper.searchPayPlanetShopInfoDetail, Pay Planet 가맹점 정보 조회, 이승택/nTels, 2014-03-25 */ cd_nm AS mid , add_field_01 AS authKey , add_field_02 AS encKey , cd_desc AS paymentUrl FROM tb_cm_cd WHERE cd_id = #{cdId} AND lang_cd = 'ko' /* 언어에 무관 */ AND use_yn = 'Y'

SELECT /* PurchaseSacCommonMapper.searchPaymentPromotionList, 결제수단 프로모션 조회, 이승택/nTels, 2014-12-09 */ prom_seq , payment_mtd_cd , prom_nm , prom_desc , prom_url , TO_CHAR(start_dt, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS start_dt , TO_CHAR(end_dt, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS end_dt FROM tb_cm_payment_prom WHERE SYSDATE BETWEEN start_dt AND end_dt ORDER BY payment_mtd_cd

SELECT /* PurchaseSacCommonMapper.searchPaymentPolicy, 결제수단 정책 조회, 이승택/nTels, 2014-11-24 */ * FROM (
SELECT tenant_id , policy_id , policy_seq , policy_nm , proc_pattern_cd , tenant_prod_grp_cd , apply_unit_cd , apply_value , cond_unit_cd , cond_value , cond_period_unit_cd , cond_period_value , cond_clsf_unit_cd , cond_clsf_value , policy_prior FROM tb_cm_tenant_sale_policy WHERE tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND proc_pattern_cd = #{procPatternCd} AND tenant_prod_grp_cd = #{prodId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND SYSDATE BETWEEN start_dt AND expr_dt UNION ALL
SELECT * FROM (SELECT tenant_id , policy_id , policy_seq , policy_nm , proc_pattern_cd , tenant_prod_grp_cd , apply_unit_cd , apply_value , cond_unit_cd , cond_value , cond_period_unit_cd , cond_period_value , cond_clsf_unit_cd , cond_clsf_value , policy_prior FROM tb_cm_tenant_sale_policy WHERE tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND proc_pattern_cd = #{procPatternCd} AND (tenant_prod_grp_cd IS NULL OR #{tenantProdGrpCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} LIKE CONCAT(tenant_prod_grp_cd, '%')) AND SYSDATE BETWEEN start_dt AND expr_dt ORDER BY NVL(LENGTH(TENANT_PROD_GRP_CD), 0) DESC, POLICY_PRIOR ) ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
